description: {"blocks":[{"key":"37coq","text":"Homebrew protocol to isolate nuclei from human frozen brain tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"avvv2","text":"Homogenize ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3tpti","text":"a.\tTransfer tissue to facs tube ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"am3iv","text":"b.\tAdd 2mL of PBSTA to the facs tube containing the tissue ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8q57g","text":"c.\tHomogenize on ice with hand-held mixer at lowest setting, 5 sec on, 5 sec off, repeat for a total of 4 times, (do not create bubbles, check no debris after homogenizing), store on ice ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bnges","text":"d.\tAdd 40uL of 10% TX100 (final conc 0.2%), pipette mix 10 times with p1000, incubate for 5min on ice. For each sample leave 2min space between","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5n5u","text":"e.\tRepeat for each sample a-c for each sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ho5v","text":"Extract nuclei and filter onto gradient ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"529ps","text":"a.\tTransfer the 2mL of PBSTA/tissue to a Dounce on ice ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkp60","text":"b.\tDounce 10 times gently to release the nuclei, do a half turn at the top and bottom movement, do not create bubbles by never lifting the Dounce out of the volume at all ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9sd0","text":"c.\tFilter the nuclei through a Miracloth (Cakbiochem, #475855) onto the 8mL of 1.4M PBS Cushion ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"521fa","text":"d.\tAdd 1mL of PBSTA to the Dounce to resuspend any remaining nuclei from the sides of the dounce, transfer these through the same Miracloth onto the 1.4M PBS Cushion ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cp683","text":"e.\tRepeat for each sample a-e for each sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b9t4l","text":"Sucrose Gradient Centrifuge ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1sbg","text":"a.\tDo not disturb the gradient ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9r8r","text":"b.\tCentrifuge nuclei through the gradient @ 3000 x g for 30 min at 4*C ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"42s8n","text":"c.\tTake out of centrifuge immediately when finished, should see a condensed white interphase","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3o4o9","text":"Resuspend Nuclei ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frrbq","text":"a.\tOn ice, remove the top layer first using a p1000 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8luhi","text":"b.\tThen remove the interphase (cell debris) using a p1000 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26l4s","text":"c.\tOnce the cell debris is removed, continue to use a p1000 to remove all supernatant, switch to a p200 tip to remove the final 200uL supernatant, make sure to remove all the supernatant without touching the pellet ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bin18","text":"d.\tResuspend the pellet in 210uL of Nuclei Wash and Resuspension Buffer, pipette 10 times using a p200, then transfer to LoBind tube on ice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"do2h2","text":"e.\tFurther resuspend the nuclei into singlets by pipette 5 times using a p200 against the wall of the epi ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5v1d9","text":"f.\tRepeat for each sample a-e for each sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"41m3k","text":"Count Nuclei ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fv3qq","text":"a.\tTransfer 10uL of nuclei into a fresh epi on ice ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32h0h","text":"b.\tAdd 10uL of Trypan Blue into the 1:2 nuclei dilution, resuspend 10 times and count nuclei numbers using a Countess","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ai6jp","text":"Wash Nuclei 1 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"15tb3","text":"a.\tAfter incubation, add 900mL of Nuclei Wash Buffer to the 200uL nuclei, pipette 5 times with p1000 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ekhma","text":"b.\tCentrifuge nuclei @ 500 x g for 5min at 4*C ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ur21","text":"c.\tDiscard most of the supernatant using a p200 tip, leaving 20uL of supernatant and pellet, being careful not to disturb the pellet ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckart","text":"d.\tPipette 10 times using a p200 to resuspend the pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fmf1c","text":"Wash Nuclei 2 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"al14i","text":"a.\tAdd 1000uL of Nuclei Wash Buffer to the 100uL nuclei, pipette 5 times with p1000 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5q6t1","text":"b.\tCentrifuge nuclei @ 500 x g for 5min at 4*C ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"akama","text":"c.\tDiscard most of the supernatant using a p200 tip, leaving 20uL of supernatant and pellet, being careful not to disturb the pellet ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmh82","text":"d.\tPipette 10 times using a p200 to resuspend the pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"76k1e","text":"Wash Nuclei 3 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ifqr","text":"a.\tAdd 1000uL of Nuclei Wash Buffer to the 100uL nuclei, pipette 5 times with p1000 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97dcu","text":"b.\tCentrifuge nuclei @ 500 x g for 5min at 4*C ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"elsk4","text":"c.\tDiscard most of the supernatant using a p200 tip, leaving 20uL of supernatant and pellet, being careful not to disturb the pellet ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asg0d","text":"d.\tPipette 10 times using a p200 to resuspend the pellet ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cvjvc","text":"e.\tAdd 100uL of Nuclei Wash Buffer, pipette 10 times using a p200 to resuspend the pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8alk3","text":"Count Nuclei ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gpeg","text":"a.\tAdd 5uL of nuclei to 5uL of Nuclei Wash Buffer in a fresh epi on ice ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1umtq","text":"b.\tAdd 10uL of Trypan Blue resuspend 10 times and count nuclei numbers using a Countess and take photos on the EVOS level 3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cvro7","text":"Flow cytometry ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1k83g","text":"a.\tAdd 20uL of nuclei to 180uL of Nuclei Wash Buffer in a fresh epi on ice ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"si41","text":"b.\tFlow QC and Count  Nuclei Dilution Protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a89np","text":"Dilute Nuclei to 1000 nuclei/uL ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fp7bn","text":"a.\tAdd 100,000 nuclei into 100uL of Nuclei Wash Buffer  Snap Freeze leftover Nuclei Protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e57qu","text":"Snap Freeze leftover nuclei ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38f29","text":"b.\tUse liquid nitrogen to snap freeze leftover nuclei and store in -80 freezer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Human_Tissue_Nuclei_Isolation_Protocol_2021_10_18
